title: When will I be able to get loot again?
body: I recently just got a chat restriction and finished it. I now have to have better behavior to get my loot back. Now I was wondering, how long does it usually take for the loot to come back?

replies.body:
Hextech crafting items won't drop until you've shown progress towards positive play.  Completing restrictions are a great start, but consistently playing without incident will show clear progress.  

We have a guide on [hextech restrictions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463) that I hope might shed some more light.  If you have any questions, the community can also help out over at the [Player Behavior boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation).  Good luck!
Thank you! I just got it dropped :)
